column4: BRIEF-Microsoft announces quarterly dividend and changes to its board of directors
column5: * Microsoft announces quarterly dividend and changes to its board of directors

column4: Microsoft's Hotmail  Outlook.com services back up after outage
column5: FRANKFURT Microsoft Corp said its free email services Outlook.com and Hotmail  which suffered an outage across Europe on Monday  were back up.

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft's Hotmail  Outlook.com services back up after outage
column5: FRANKFURT  Sept 18 Microsoft Corp said its free email services Outlook.com and Hotmail  which suffered an outage across Europe on Monday  were back up.

column4: Tesla shares fall from record high after warning from analyst
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Tesla  fell from record highs on Tuesday after an analyst warned that the electric car maker may take longer than expected to become profitable.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tencent  Guangzhou Auto agree to collaborate on internet-connected cars
column5: * Firms to also work on AI-assisted driving  explore investments

column4: Japan's Pioneer teams up with digital mapping company HERE
column5: FRANKFURT  Sept 19 Pioneer and digital mapping group HERE said on Tuesday they had agreed to invest in one another so the companies can develop maps for autonomous driving services.
